Vonis Terpidana Reklamasi Jakarta Dikurangi, Hakim Beda Opini
02 Nov 2019, 15:23 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Narapidana dalam kasus suap pembahasan Raperda Reklamasi M Sanusi. (ANTARA FOTO/Akbar Nugroho Gumay)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Mahkamah Agung mengabulkan Peninjauan Kembali (PK) mantan anggota DPRD DKI Jakarta Mohamad Sanusi terkait kasus suap proyek reklamasi Teluk Jakarta. Masa hukuman Sanusi yang semula 10 tahun penjara dikurangi menjadi tujuh tahun penjara."Mengabulkan permohonan PK pemohon dengan menjatuhkan pidana penjara sama dengan pidana yang dijatuhkan Pengadilan Tipikor Jakarta Pusat yaitu tujuh tahun penjara dan denda Rp250 juta subsidier dua bulan kurungan," ujar jubir MA Andi Samsan Nganro saat dikonfirmasi, Sabtu (2/11). Andi mengatakan dari tiga hakim terdapat satu hakim yakni Ketua Majelis Hakim Surya Jaya yang menyatakan dissenting opinion atau pendapat berbeda. Namun Andi tak menjelaskan perbedaan pendapat tersebut. "Putusan ini tidak bulat karena hakim Surya Jaya mengajukan DO (dissenting opinion)," katanya. Vonis hakim ini sama dengan yang dijatuhkan majelis hakim Pengadilan Tipikor Jakarta yakni tujuh tahun penjara. Namun vonis itu kemudian diperberat di Pengadilan Tinggi Jakarta menjadi 10 tahun penjara. Sanusi sebelumnya divonis bersalah menerima suap Rp2 miliar terkait pembahasan Rancangan Peraturan Daerah mengenai zonasi pesisir untuk proyek reklamasi di Teluk Jakarta pada tahun 2016. Ia juga divonis melakukan Tindak Pidana Pencucian Uang (TPPU) atas dugaan penyimpangan harta kekayaan dengan pendapatan sebagai Pegawai Negeri Sipil (PNS). Harta kekayaannya sebagai anggota DPRD DKI mencapai Rp45 miliar. Dalam perkara ini, penyuap Sanusi, Presiden Direktur PT Agung Podomoro Land Tbk Ariesman Widjaja juga telah divonis hakim tiga tahun penjara. (psp/wis)

Jakarta Conviction convict verdict reduced, different judges opinion
02 Nov 2019, 15:23 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Prisoners in the case of bribery discussing the M Sanusi Reclamation Raperda. (BETWEEN PHOTOS / Akbar Nugroho Gumay)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - The Supreme Court granted Review (PK) of former DKI Jakarta DPRD member Mohamad Sanusi related to the bribery case of the Jakarta Bay reclamation project. Sanusi's sentence which was originally 10 years in prison was reduced to seven years in prison. "Granting the petitioner's petition PK application by imposing a prison sentence is the same as the sentence imposed by the Central Jakarta Corruption Court, which is seven years in prison and a fine of Rp. 250 million in subsidies of two months," said MA spokesman Andi Samsan Nganro when confirmed, Saturday (2/11). Andi said of the three judges there was one judge, namely the Chairperson of the Surya Jaya Judges' Panel who stated dissenting opinions. But Andi did not explain the difference of opinion. "This ruling is not unanimous because a judge from Surya Jaya submits a DO (dissenting opinion)," he said. The judge's sentence was the same as the one handed down by the Jakarta Corruption Court judges, seven years in prison. But the verdict was later made worse at the Jakarta High Court to 10 years in prison. Sanusi was previously convicted of accepting a bribe of Rp2 billion related to the discussion of the Draft Regional Regulation concerning coastal zoning for the reclamation project in the Jakarta Bay in 2016. He was also convicted of a money laundering (TPPU) for alleged misappropriation of assets with income as a Civil Servant (PNS) ). His assets as a member of the DKI DPRD reached Rp45 billion. In this case, Sanusi's bribe, President Director of PT Agung Podomoro Land Tbk, Ariesman Widjaja, has also been sentenced by a judge to three years in prison. (psp / wis)
